headline: Mastercard to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., February 12, 2026--Mastercard (NYSE: MA) announced its participation in two investor conferences in March.

headline: Rezolve AI (RZLV) Strengthens AI Commerce Growth With Reward Loyalty Deal
summary: Rezolve AI PLC (NASDAQ:RZLV) is one of the best AI penny stocks to buy right now. On February 10, Rezolve AI PLC (NASDAQ:RZLV) finalized a complete acquisition of Reward Loyalty UK Limited. The company said it paid $230 million in cash, using existing cash resources without issuing equity or taking on external financing. This non-dilutive, […]

headline: Is Mastercard (MA) Still Sensibly Priced After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Mastercard's share price still makes sense for your portfolio, the key question is how its current price stacks up against what the business may be worth. The stock last closed at US$537.46, with returns of 2.9% decline over 7 days, 5.1% decline over 30 days, 4.6% decline year to date, and 4.3% decline over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 48.0% and 63.9% respectively. Recent share moves have come as Mastercard continues to feature in broader...

headline: Truist launches secure open banking experience
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today introduced its first open banking integration, connecting first to Mastercard's open finance technology. The API-based platform provides Truist consumer and small business clients with secure, centralized access to their financial data—unlocking transparency, personalization and control across a growing ecosystem of trusted fintech apps.
